text: The Great Consoler () is a 1933 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Kuleshov.Лев Кулешов "Великий утешитель"ВЕЛИКИЙ УТЕШИТЕЛЬ It stars Konstantin Khokhlov, Ivan Novoseltsev, and Vasili Kovrigin. ==Actors== * Konstantin Khokhlov - Bill Porter * Ivan Novoseltsev - Jim Valentine - aka Ralph D. Spenser * Vasili Kovrigin - Warden * Andrei Fajt - Det. Ben Price * Daniil Vvedensky - Jailguard * Weyland Rodd - Black convict == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1933 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kuleshov
title: The Great Consoler
